sections.title: Debug Test Section
content:
# Test Heading

This is a simple test paragraph to verify text rendering. It should appear as normal text in the rendered output.

Here is a second paragraph with **bold** and *italic* text to test markdown rendering.
Here is a separate content chunk with some math: $E = mc^2$ which should be rendered as an inline equation.

blocks.content: This is a test theorem displayed as a block with custom styling.
